text: Olivier Eggimann (28 January 1919 â€“ 16 April 2002) was a Swiss football player. He played as a midfielder. He was born in Renens. Eggimann played for Switzerland in the 1950 and 1954 FIFA World Cup.Copa do Mundo da FIFA Brasil 1950 He also played for BSC Young Boys, FC Lausanne-Sport, Servette FC, ES FC Malley, and FC La Chaux-de-Fonds. Eggimann died on 16 April 2002 in Renens at the age of 83. == References == == Other websites == *FIFA profile * Category:1919 births Category:2002 deaths Category:Swiss footballers Category:Association football midfielders Category:Sportspeople from Vaud
title: Olivier Eggimann
